title: 820-4924: Stuck on apple log
message:
Any suggestion on this issue having me stumped.

Boots up to apple logo and gets stuck on the logo, no progress bar. After powering it down by holding power button, it refuses to start till i performed SMC reset. AHT hangs ones it starts up the fan.

Reflashed bios and also cleaned the ME region. still having the same boot issue. Also replaced the chip (U6100), with the same boot issue. I've inspected the board for corrosion, found none.

title: 820-4924: Stuck on apple log
message:
Up for this post, I have the same issue here. I hope sir rossman team can see this post.

Thanks

title: 820-4924: Stuck on apple log
message:
Remove internal SSD and try to boot through USB.
Any history available?
